== Eravu (CT) (627849) ==

Eravu (CT) is a town in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 5.24 sq. km. and harbouring 1089 households with total population of 4447 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 10 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 297 km. Male population is 2089 and female population is 2358. Scheduled Caste population is 532 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the town is 627849<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class VI (population_total < 5,000).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 10 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 90 km. Railway station is at Thrissur at a distance of 10 km.
